dct_title_s: Udsigt af Öen og Fortet Bense af Smith
dct_description_sm: Bird's-eye view of island at top; panoramic view at bottom.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale statement: Maalestav af 20 Rouler.
North oriented toward lower left of sheet.
Appears in Prévost's L'Histoire generale des voyages.
